@Module.Name: Predict
@Module.Description: This module is a prediction model, predicting what will appear after clicking each components on current screen

Output.<div id=1 class='' > Use 24-hour format\: Option to use 24-hour format with the current time displayed as 1:00 PM
Output.<switch id=2 class='android:id/switch_wi: Switch to turn off the 24-hour format
Output.<div id=3 class='' > Use locale default: Option to use the default time format based on the device's locale
Output.<switch id=4 class='android:id/switch_wi: Switch to turn on the use of locale default time format
Output.<div id=5 class='' > Time zone\n <p>: Option to set the time zone with the current time zone displayed as GMT+08:00 China Standard Time
Output.<div id=6 class='' > Use location\n <: Option to use location for setting the time zone with a description explaining that location may be used
Output.<switch id=7 class='android:id/switch_wi: Switch to turn off the use of location for setting the time zone
Output.<div id=8 class='' > Time\n <p> 9:17: Display the current time as 9:17 PM
Output.<div id=9 class='' > Date\n <p> Augus: Display the current date as August 30, 2023
Output.<div id=10 class='' description='Navigat: Button to navigate back to the previous page

@Module.Name: Select
@Module.Description: This module is a selection model, selecting the 5 possible component without relativity ranking to be acted on catering to user's intent
@Module.Note: This individual module only select 5 highly related components,without ranking them,and without analyzing the correctness of the components aligning with user's content

Output.<div id=1 class='' > Use 24-hour format\: This component represents the option to use the 24-hour format for the clock. By clicking on it, the user can toggle the switch to turn on the 24-hour format.
Output.<switch id=2 class='android:id/switch_wi: This component represents the switch to turn off the 24-hour format. To achieve the user's intent, the user must toggle this switch to turn on the 24-hour format.
Output.<div id=3 class='' > Use locale default: This component represents the option to use the default time format based on the device's locale. Since the user wants to turn on the 24-hour format, it's important to check and ensure that this option is set to off.
Output.<switch id=4 class='android:id/switch_wi: This component represents the switch to turn on the use of the locale default time format. To achieve the user's intent, the user must toggle this switch to turn off the use of the locale default time format.
Output.<div id=5 class='' > Time zone\n <p>: This component represents the option to set the time zone. Changing the time zone is not directly related to the user's intent. However, it's worth including this component as it is on the settings page for the clock app and might have the option to set the 24-hour format as well.

@Module.Name: Plan
@Module.Description: This module is a plan module, planning the next action based on the selected components, whether click or edit

candidate1.reason: To access the option for changing the time format.

candidate2.reason: To turn on the 24-hour format for the clock.

candidate3.reason: Switching to the 'Use locale default' option is not relevant to changing the time format.

candidate4.reason: Switching to the 'On' option is not relevant to changing the time format.

candidate5.reason: Switching to the 'Time zone' option is not relevant to changing the time format.

@Module.Name: Evaluate
@Module.Description: This module is an evaluation module, evaluating the selected components of their contribution to fulfilling the user's intent

@Module.Name: Decide
@Module.Description: This module is a decision module, deciding the final action based on the evaluation result, whether complete or wrong or go on

Output.reason: The user has successfully activated the 'Use 24-hour format' option, changing the view of the time to the 24-hour format. The action trace aligns with the task and the result on the newest UI screen is consistent with the task. Therefore, the task's status is completed.
